message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI 

This paper deals with modeling social events and optimizing external drives to steer the network towards a target state. The primary focus is on social networks and their activity, which falls under the categories of social networks (cs.SOC) and social and information networks (cs.SI). The paper also uses multivariate Hawkes processes, which are commonly used in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG), and the optimization framework is based on convex optimization, which is a common technique in data science (cs.DS) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
